resources.string: We have sent you an email to reset your password. It may take some time for the email to arrive.
The password does not follow the password guidelines below.
The first name field can only contain letters.
You cannot enter more than 256 characters.
Registration is not available because you are offline
You have already registered with another %s account. Please log in to %s account.
Please verify your email address through the activation link sent to your email account
You\'ve entered something I cannot understand. Please check.
The username or password you entered is incorrect.
There was a problem with the network connection. Please try again.
Failed to log in. Please try again later.
Failed to connect to the server, Please try again after some time.
Please enter a valid email address.
This email address is already in use. Please enter a different one, or go back and log in with this email address.
This email address is already in use with a Philips account or a social media account.\nPlease go back to the \'Log in\' step, or use another email address.
Please verify your email address through the activation link sent to your email account
We have sent an email to: %s. It may take some time for the email to arrive.
Please enter your Philips password to merge your account.
Press the \"Resend\" button if you have not received an email.
No worries! You do not need a Philips password. You have logged in with a social provider previously.
Sorry to make you click twice. You have previously logged in with a social provider. Please go back to the log in step, and log in with your social provider.
Protect your privacy by choosing a strong password.
I would like to receive periodic offers and updates from Philips
You have used %s before to create a Philips account.
Previously, you logged in with %s, using %s on a Philips app or website. We will connect %s to your account.
To make sure it is really you, please log in with %s once more.
If you would not like to connect %s to your account, press \"cancel\" and log in with %s.
We have sent an email to: %s
It may take some time for the email to arrive.
Please check your email to activate your account.

Having problems?
- It may take some time for the verification email to arrive
- Look in your spam folder as well
- Press the "Resend" button below if you did not receive the verification email

We have sent an email. It may take some time for the email to arrive.

Please check your email to activate your account.

You can use the app in the meantime.
By creating an account or signing in you certify that you are %s years or older.\n
Please accept the Terms and Conditions
We have sent you an email to verify your email address. It may take some time for the email to arrive.
We will send you an email to reset your password.

As a result of your consent, Philips group companies may contact you with promotional communications based on your preferences and behaviour, about Philips products, services, events and promotions. 
We may contact you via email, SMS and other digital channels, such as mobile apps and social media. In order to be able to tailor the communications for you and provide you with the best, most personalised experience, we may analyse and combine your personal data. 

This data may include:
Data that you want to actively share with us such as: your name, date of birth or age, email address, physical address, country, gender, phone number, social media profile.\n\n
Data we get from your interactions with Philips:\n

Data about your interactions and usage of the Philips digital channels, such as social media, websites, email, apps and connected products. This data may include: IP address, cookies, device information, communications that you click on, location details and websites that you visit
Philips will give you the opportunity to withdraw your consent at any time.
Do you want to access more account settings?\nVisit %s via your browser.
Receive Philips\' promotional communications based on my preferences and online behaviour\n%s
Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later
Your email address is already verified. You may continue.
This is not a phone number I can recognise. Please double-check. \nIf you\'re in a different country, you may have to change your country settings .
Having Problems?\n- It may take some time for the SMS with the code to arrive\n- If you have not received an SMS when the countdown clock ends, press the \'Resend\' button
We have sent an SMS with a code to your phone. Please enter this code to log in.
The verification code you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
Are you sure you want to log out? You\'ll have limited access to the app while logged out.
You have logged in with number: %s
The verification code you entered is incorrect. Please try again or press resend to receive a new code via SMS.
The phone number you entered is not registered yet.
The combination of phone number and/or password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
We have sent an SMS with a code to your phone. Please enter this code to reset your password.
Please choose a new password to reset your password.
You have reset your password and logged in with number: %s
This phone number is already in use.
This phone number is already in use with a Philips or social media account.\nPlease go back to the \'Log in\' step, or use another phone number.
I cannot recognise the email or phone number you entered. Please check.
This is not a phone number I can recognise. Please double-check. \nIf you\'re in a different country, you may have to change your country settings .
Provided phone number is not enabled for SMS.
Provided phone number is not supported by the country.
The limit has been reached for phone number. Please wait a while then try again.
Oops. Something went wrong and I was not able to send an SMS. Please try again later.
SMS not sent. Account already verified.
I don\'t recognise the phone number or password you entered. Please try again
Please verify your mobile number through the activation code we sent to you via SMS
Having Problems?\n- It may take some time for the SMS with the code to arrive\n- If you have not received an SMS press the \'Resend\' button
This is not a verification code I can recognise. Please try again.
What are you going to get?
Special offers, promotions and first-hand information about new product releases. Tailored for you!
Receive promotional communications from Philips based on my preferences and online behaviour\n%s
SMS has been successfully resent to your mobile number.
I cannot recognise the phone number that you entered. Please check.
